## relativeHexDirection() function

Get the hex direction pointing from source to target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function relativeHexDirection(source: HexCoordinate, target: HexCoordinate): number;
```

The target coordinate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

The hex direction pointing from source to target.

## Exceptions

Error if the hex coordinates are not adjacent.
